author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-El Dawlia Fertilizers to Buy Stake in International Agricultural Corps and Ferchem
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - INTERNATIONAL COMPANY FOR FERTILIZERS AND CHEMICALS:
* STUDYING ACQUISITION OF 21.87 PERCENT STAKE IN INTERNATIONAL AGRICULTURAL CORPS FROM INTERNATIONAL COMPANY FOR FERTILIZERS AND CHEMICALS JABALY FAMILY AND CO
* STUDYING ACQUISITION OF 36.72 PERCENT STAKE IN FERCHEM MISR FOR FERTILIZERS AND CHEMICALS FROM INTERNATIONAL COMPANY FOR FERTILIZERS AND CHEMICALS JABALY FAMILY AND CO Source:( bit.ly/2G65J1Y ) Further company coverage:
